solution_line_template: Grant threw the ball 25% farther than Parker. If Parker threw the ball {parker_distance} yards, then Grant threw it {parker_distance}*{grant_percent_farther} = <<{parker_distance}*{grant_percent_farther}={grant_extra_distance}>>{grant_extra_distance} farther
In total, Grant threw the ball {parker_distance}+{grant_extra_distance} = <<{parker_distance}+{grant_extra_distance}={grant_total_distance}>>{grant_total_distance} yards
Kyle threw 2 times farther than Grant so Kyle threw the ball {kyle_multiplier}*{grant_total_distance} = <<{kyle_multiplier}*{grant_total_distance}={kyle_distance}>>{kyle_distance} yards

If Kyle threw the ball for {kyle_distance} yards and Parker threw for {parker_distance} then Kyle threw the ball {kyle_distance}-{parker_distance} = <<{kyle_distance}-{parker_distance}={answer}>>{answer} yards farther
